name: Michelle Royal
what_you_do: Michelle Royal founded the first Royal Makeup & Hair team in Savannah, GA in 2014. Prior to that, she worked as a model and a makeup & hair artist in New York City.
who_you_serve: Michelle has done hair & makeup for Bravo's TV shows, as well as over 600 weddings, numerous photo shoots, runway shows, proms and other events.
social_proof: Michelle's makeup artistry was featured on the cover of The Vow magazine as well as hair and makeup artistry featured throughout the pages of several issues of Savannah Weddings Magazine, Savannah Soiree and several wedding blogs and online publications.
business_focus: Michelle Royal provides makeup and hair services for weddings, events, and photo shoots.
